title: February 17th, 2022 - Rick & Bubba Show
description:
Sponsor: MDHearingAid is proud to be a Midwest company that has provided affordable hearing for over a decade to more than 500,000 Americans. Our hearing aids are high-quality, FDA-registered medical devices that are programmed to the highest standards and tested by our in-house team of audiologists and hearing professionals. The hearing aids are then shipped out all over the U.S. So get clinic-level care for 80% less with MDHearingAid.  Go to https://MDHearingAid.com and use promo code BUBBA to get their Buy 1/Get 1 for $299.99 EACH when you buy a pair deal. Plus, they are adding a FREE Extra Charging Case, a $100 value, just for The Rick and Bubba Show Audience.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
